** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|{{{field|minecraft:profile}}}}}: The texture path, skin address, or user profile used to render [[player head]] blocks, [[player head]] item models, [[mannequin]]s, and [[text component##Player_Object_Type|player object text components]].
